articles.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as part of physical AI push - BBC
articles.description: The chip giant is looking for ways to move the AI revolution beyond software and into physical products.
articles.content:
Lily JamaliNorth America Technology correspondent
Nvidia has unveiled a new tech platform for self-driving cars as the world's leading chip-maker seeks more physical products to embed AI into.
